BackEnd

Class CustomBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • BackEnd.CustomBoard

  • public class CustomBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    A custom, user-generated board.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomBoard

        public CustomBoard()
        Creates a custom board with default size, tile count and player positions.

      • CustomBoard

        public CustomBoard(int xSize,
                   int ySize,
                   Coordinate[] playerPos,
                   java.util.ArrayList<FloorTile> tiles,
                   java.util.HashMap<TileType,java.lang.Integer> silkBagMap)
        Creates a custom board with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        xSize - width of the board
        ySize - height of the board
        playerPos - positions of the players
        tiles - tiles which will be in the board
        silkBagMap - quantity of each tile type in the silk bag
